author: ifdussaut
content: Hi, I think https://prater.beaconcha.in/ has not been updating for several hours. It says that there are no validators and that the last epoch is 11352. Querying my beacon client I see that the chainhead is in epoch 11460 and the finalized epoch in 11458. Anybody else is seeing this?

author: jgm
content: Yeah looks like it's not updating <@!97774605351010304> ^^

author: megamanx666
content: is the mainnet explorer also catching up?  i have a node running on mainnet that says it is currently synced to epoch 39663 but beaconcha.in says it is at epoch 36741
